title: Mosses
body:
The work of Professor A. Luisier, entitled *Les Mousses de Mad√®re*, lists 189 species of mosses in our Archipelago, some of which are common, such as *Dicranum Scottianum*, *Fissidens asplenioides*, *F. serrulatus*, *Weisia viridula*, *Trichostomu*, *brachydontium*, *Glyphomitrium polyphyllum*, *G. *nigricans*, *Funaria hygrometrica*, *Haplodontium Notarisii*, *Epipterygium Tozeri*, *Bryum capillare*, *Mnium undulatum*, *Bartramia stricta*, *Polytrichum juniperinum*, *Thamnium alopecurum*, *Scleropodium illecebrum*, etc., etc..

V. Cardot, Dixon, Geheeb, Juratzka, Luisier, Mitten, Schiffner, and Winter.
